about_the_game:
CYBER CLIMB blends fast-paced movement shooter with strategic factory building.
Like Satisfactory + Titanfall 2.

Your objectives are simple: kill robots, finish quests, build a rocket to get home from Mars. Along the way, you'll encounter increasingly difficult enemies, challenging environments, and a variety of obstacles designed to test your skills.

With inspiration from games like RoboQuest, Deadlink, and Deus Ex, CYBER CLIMB delivers dynamic combat and fluid movement mechanics. Use a grappling hook, double jumps, and air dashes to outmaneuver enemies and navigate tricky platforms. Choose from 7 different weapons, upgrade your abilities with a roguelike card system, and make every run unique as the challenge intensifies the longer you play.

Key Features:

  • 7 unique weapons to discover and master

  • Factory building: crafting, conveyor belts, batteries, etc.

  • Movement mechanics like grappling hooks, double jumps, and air dashes for fast-paced traversal

  • Skills such as throwing grenades and creating bounce pads for creative combat

  • Roguelike upgrade system: buy new cards and power-ups with in-game currency

  • Dynamic difficulty: the longer the run, the harder the game becomes

  • Box stacking to create exploration opportunities

  • Immersive sim elements that reward experimentation and strategy

CYBER CLIMB is currently in heavy development by a solo developer, with regular updates and new content planned until the release. Feedback from players is highly appreciated!

content_descriptors.notes: There is gun violence in the game, such as shooting robots and people with guns. Alcoholic beverages like beer can be consumed to regain health.

name: Cyber Climb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-5820K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: CYBER CLIMB is a mix of movement shooter and factory automation: air dashes and grappling hooks help you to finish quests to build up your factory. Final goal: build a rocket to leave Mars.
